variable.comment: Speed at which the wheel rotates
variable.name: RotateSpeed

variable.comment: Game timer in the format S.MS (where we get our timestamp from)
variable.name: Timer

sub-events.comment: Destroy objects to reset layout; Play music; Create object (yet to be defined); Start timer; Save the player name; Reset multiplier to 1 (0 multiplier makes no sense)
Set the polygon vertices and load the corresponding input sequence generated previously in matlab (see files folder in "objects" to read file)

event-group.description: Draws the polygon based on variable "Vertices" (inactive on start so vertices can load first)
event-group.title: Draw

sub-events.comment: Use a type of cooldown to prevent movement while
Set variable timer to the timer itself. // show text that needs constant updating.
Timer serves as a means of preventing desync between the wheel and the fixed angle (prevents movement until the wheel has reached the next significant angle

action.name: Write file
action.param: NWjs.UserFolder & "\Desktop\" &"gamedata\"& "data" & Date.Month & "-" & Date.Day & "_" & Date.Hours & "," & date.Minutes & "," & Date.Seconds & "," & date.Milliseconds & ".txt"

action.name: Write file
action.param: NWjs.UserFolder & "/Desktop/" &"gamedata/"& "data" & Date.Month & "-" & Date.Day & "_" & Date.Hours & "," & date.Minutes & "," & Date.Seconds & "," & date.Milliseconds & ".txt"
